name: v_l1_norm
description: Calculates the l1 norm between two dense_vectors.

params.name: left
params.description: first dense_vector to calculate l1 norm similarity

params.name: right
params.description: second dense_vector to calculate l1 norm similarity

examples:
from colors
| eval similarity = v_l1_norm(rgb_vector, [0, 255, 255])
| sort similarity desc, color asc
